alert.note: Alert for Arthur (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 7:20PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT/700 PM MDT/ FOR EAST CENTRAL ARTHUR...SOUTHWESTERN HOOKER AND NORTHWESTERN MCPHERSON COUNTIES... At 719 PM CDT/619 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 17 miles east of Arthur, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Flatts, Big Lamunyon Flats, Bucktail, Sand Beach Lake, East Cody Lake and Calora. This includes Highway 92 between mile markers 174 and 184. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
